H0.text: In 1981, what became the first ever music video to be shown on MTV. "Don't Stop Believin'" by Journey

H1.text: In 1981, what became the first ever music video to be shown on MTV. "London Calling" by The Clash

H2.text: In 1981, what became the first ever music video to be shown on MTV. "Just What I Needed" by The Cars

H3.text: In 1981, what became the first ever music video to be shown on MTV. Video Killed The Radio Star by Buggles

A4.text: The music video for Video Killed the Radio Star is notable as the first video ever played on MTV, when the US channel began broadcasting at 12:01 AM on 1 August 1981.
